thread.title: NASA Official Highlights Risk of Manned-Spacecraft Efforts
thread.title_full: NASA Official Highlights Risk of Manned-Spacecraft Efforts - WSJ

author: Andy Pasztor
title: NASA Official Highlights Risk of Manned-Spacecraft Efforts
text:
WASHINGTON—With the U.S. developing a handful of new rockets and spacecraft intended to transport astronauts into space, NASA’s top human exploration official issued a somber warning Tuesday about potentially fatal risks associated with the programs.
William Gerstenmaier, a career National Aeronautics and Space Administration official with three decades of high-level experience, told an industry-government conference that lawmakers, agency officials and the public have failed to explicitly acknowledge the full extent of...
